dmca.title: Website Operator Asks Google to Remove Competitor's Site
dmca.body:
xxx.xxx.xxxx
Dr.[private] 
http://www.penisimprovement.com
Owner
Contact emails:
[private]@[private].com
[private]@[private].com
To:
Google Inc
Attn: Customer Support,  DMCA  Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043


Sirs:
Sections of my website http://www.penisimprovement.com have been copied and are being used by an individual.

The masthead image, design and a freeze image of the flash banner on my site, http://www.penisimprovement.com are the protected contents in question.
These infringing pages are currently being listed by Google in the search results as follows.

Search Query: penis enlargement
Infringing web pages: penis-enlargement.day4sex.com 
Big-penis.day4sex.com
Search query: penis
Infringing web pages: same as above
Search query: penis enlargement pills 
Infringing web pages: same as above

Most likely, these pages are showing up in numerous search terms on your engine.
I have attempted to contact the "owner" of these sites by the email address listed on them ([private]@[private].com)
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notice above is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

A simply look at my site (url referenced above) provides all the proof you need.

Dr. [private]
Owner PenisImprovement.com
